content: looking for something to add a little flair to your outfit check out this pattern this pattern will show you how to create your own bolero this pattern only comes in a woman size small the yarn we use for our project is the yarn bee soft & sleek dk low pill fiber light 3 100% low pill acrylic we need two balls of yarns to complete our project the color yarn is pretty in peacock the finished length measurement of our bolero is approximately 13 1/2 the bolero is worked in one piece from the neck down to the underarms stitches are then skipped to form armholes and the body is worked in one piece down to the lower edge if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/4iaqvq5omoo
